mosinstall.name: YOOcarousel
mosinstall.author: YOOtheme
mosinstall.description:
YOOcarousel module of the YOOtheme club for Joomla! 1.0. Requires mootools 1.1

YOOtheme website
http://www.yootheme.com.

YOOtheme demo server
http://demo.yootheme.com.

Changelog

1.0.4
- fixed Safari 3 bug

1.0.3
- New slideshow style
- Completely redesigned the carousel css styling
- Added Next/Previous button to scroll through the slides
- Added configurable rotate action effect to define the transition
- Added randomize items option to configuration

1.0.2
- removed line-height space caused by tabs for IE6

1.0.1
- removed line-height space caused by br tag

1.0.0
- Initial Release

param.name: catid
param.label: Category
param.description: A content category which items are used for the YOOcarousel

param.name: slide_interval
param.label: Slide interval (ms)
param.description: Time interval of changing between items when autoplay on in milliseconds

param.name: transition_duration
param.label: Transition duration (ms)
param.description: Time interval of the transition effect when autoplay is on in milliseconds

param.name: transition_effect
param.label: Transition effect
param.description: Define the transition effect for the autoplay

param.name: rotate_action
param.label: Rotate action
param.description: Action behavior of the control panel

param.name: rotate_duration
param.label: Rotate duration (ms)
param.description: Time interval of the transition effect when a action of the control panel is triggered in milliseconds

param.name: rotate_effect
param.label: Rotate effect
param.description: Define the transition effect when a action of the control panel is triggered

param.name: buttons
param.label: Buttons
param.description: Hide/Show the next and previous buttons

param.name: items
param.label: No. of Items
param.description: Maximum no of items to display

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
